synopsis.text:
Releases In the heart of Tokyo, an ordinary teenager, Shougo Yahagi, finds himself thrust into an extraordinary world of secrets and danger. After his friend's mysterious death, Shougo stumbles upon a prototype motorcycle, 'Garland,' that turns his mundane life upside down. The motorcycle, sought after by covert agents, possesses an incredible secret - it can transform into a colossal robot.

As Shougo navigates through the labyrinth of deception and political intrigue, he realizes that the world he once knew is merely an illusion. With the military on his tail and the government turning a blind eye, Shougo and his friends must unravel the truth behind the conspiracy that shrouds their reality.

In this thrilling adventure, Shougo's only hope lies in an artificial intelligence that holds the key to humanity's destiny. Will Shougo and his friends uncover the truth and change their world forever? Join them in "Megazone 23 Part 1" and embark on a journey filled with action, suspense, and revelations that will leave you questioning the nature of reality itself.
